g.text: ⊕ hierarchical composition; W encodes coordination strength.
Hierarchical BMD coordination enables precision + thermodynamic efficiency.
dρ/dt = -i/ħ [H,ρ] + Σ_k γ_k (L_k ρ L_k† - ½{L_k†L_k,ρ})
U = Σ_{i<j} [4ε_ij ((σ_ij/r_ij)^{12} - (σ_ij/r_ij)^6) + q_i q_j/(4π ε_0 r_ij)]
max_r Σ_i w_i f_i(r) s.t. Σ_i r_i ≤ R_total
φ_q = ω_q t + δ_q; φ_m = ω_m t + δ_m; φ_e = ω_e t + δ_e
n_q φ_q + n_m φ_m + n_e φ_e = 0
R = 1 - S_largest / N (after removing fraction f)
Integrity: hash(S) → compare → recover if mismatch
P_network(N)=P₀ N^α (log N)^β e^{ -γ N / N_critical }
Nodes: 10^3 → Mem 2.3±0.3 GB | CPU 8±2 | BW 0.47±0.08 Gbps
N_quantum ≥ 10^5; T_coherence > 50 μs; T=298 K; pH=7.4
• Encryption pipeline: session key hashing + public key wrap
• Byzantine tolerance: n ≥ 3f+1 ensures consensus safety
• Integrity verification: hash diff triggers forensic + rollback
Cross-layer clocks aligned via integer phase constraint
Tri-scale Biological Maxwell Demon coordination unifies quantum precision, molecular adaptability, and environmental stability to enable high-efficiency molecular manufacturing.
Sustained coordination: ≥92% efficiency; inter-layer transfer up to 2.3 Gbps; coherent quantum operations preserved at biologically compatible conditions.
Adaptive topology + fault tolerance + security compose a resilient substrate supporting temporal navigation, quantum foundry integration, and consciousness-aligned computation.
Scalability projections validate feasibility through 10^6 nodes; future pathways extend toward 10^9 nodes with enhanced neuromorphic and quantum-entangled control layers.
Foundation established for large-scale biological Maxwell demon deployment across advanced computational and manufacturing domains.
Diagram synthesized from provided specification: formulas, metrics, scaling laws, protocols, and future directions consolidated into a single architectural map.

Legend: Colors group conceptual layers (quantum / molecular / environmental / coordination / topology / scaling / security / future). Equations shown in monospaced font; performance metrics derived from provided values; arrows indicate directional dependency or synchronization flow.
